feed.title: Raghav Kukreti’s Log
feed.subtitle: A collection of interesting notes, logs and research regarding the current state of affairs. Expect a lot of web, Julia, r/selfhosted and music

entry.title: Day One
entry.content:
Finshed up the blog, I think I now lean back and just edit Markdown files since designed most of what’s needed.

Wanted to keep this clean, didn’t want to add a lot of animations/transitions all that malarkey. Just a space where I can write, kind of like Dan Eden’s really nice project Onword (though unmaintained now).
entry.summary: Finshed up the blog, I think I now lean back and just edit Markdown files since designed most of what’s needed.

entry.title: <day/0>
entry.content:
Thought it was high time I got back into my daily rhythm of work. Whipped up this quick Jekyll blog from scratch to get a feel for working at > 1.5 hours.

Another benefit is I can ramble endlessly about what I find interesting.

Let’s see how long this lasts/where it goes.

Hope you have fun!
entry.summary: Thought it was high time I got back into my daily rhythm of work. Whipped up this quick Jekyll blog from scratch to get a feel for working at > 1.5 hours.
